tool_description: Free API to explore Pharmaceutical information of Bangladesh. List of the companies, List of the generics, Brands of generics with doses, price.  Total 20247 brands from 176 companies.
name: Pharmaseed
title: Pharmaseed

api_list.name: Search brands by name
api_list.description: Search brand by name API search brands that match with the name pattern given in the query pattern.

api_list.name: List brands by company id
List companies
api_list.description: List of companies with name and id. Default pagination skip and limit set to 0 and 10. Those can be passed through query with skip and limit parameter.

api_list.name: List generics with unique brand
api_list.description: List generic names with brands grouped by generic names.  Default pagination skip and limit set to 0 and 10. Those can be passed through query with skip and limit parameter.

api_list.name: Get brand by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pharmaseed1.p.rapidapi.com/brands/6152ae361b8d3e8199628c04"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pharmaseed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pharmaseed1.p.rapidapi.com/brands/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pharmaseed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List brands
api_list.description: List brands with name, generic_name, dose, type and company_id. Default pagination skip and limit set to 0 and 10. Those can be passed through query with skip and limit parameter.
